plot: Homer and Marge try to have a vacation without the kids but Bart and Lisa follow them everywhere they go.

Marge and Homer decide not to go to Dayton, Ohio, to celebrate Uncle Tyrone's birthday. In stead they go to Miami to enjoy a vacation without the children. When Bart and Lisa find out they are insulted and decide to chase their parents so they cannot enjoy their vacation without children.—Emil Petersen
